Container.Name: ama
Container.Description: Automated Music Archiver :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client
Container.Overview: Automated Music Archiver :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: Number of Concurrent Processes
Config.Description: Number of concurrent processes, controls download concurrency and encoding/tagging concurrency

Config.Name: DL Client ARL Token
Config.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

Config.Name: Related Artist
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your artist list for related artists and process them

Config.Name: Related Artist -> Related Artist (loop)
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your related artists for additional related artists and process them accordingly :: WARNING this will cause an endless loop (spider crawling) until no more are found...

Config.Name: Format
Config.Description: SET TO: ALAC or FLAC or AAC or MP3 or OPUS

Config.Name: Conversion Bitrate
Config.Description: FLAC -> OPUS/AAC/MP3 will be converted using this bitrate

Config.Name: Lidarr List Import
Config.Description: true = enabled :: imports artist list from lidarr

Config.Name: Lidarr Url
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Config.Name: Lidarr API Key
Config.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...
